column1: '''Pippin Looks After Merry''' is the forty-sixth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and the fifty-seventh scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]]. It was extended in the latter edition.
